name: Pet of the Week – Kingston
description: This week's Pet of the Week is short in stature but big on playtime - Meet Kingston (Tag #S550), an olde english bulldogge mix who is looking for a new home! Kingston is a loyal pal who will stick by your side... particularly if you have some treats for him.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: This week’s Pet of the Week is short in stature but big on playtime – Meet Kingston (Tag #S550), an olde english bulldogge mix who is looking for a new home! Kingston is a loyal pal who will stick by your side… particularly if you have some treats for him. If you’re interested in adopting Kingston, please go to www.SDDAC.com.
